comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: Bain's caption renders the name as "A. Bailly-Blanchard".

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a biography of him for Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur Bailly-Blanchard The spelling "Arthur Bailly-Blanchard" gets the most hits in Google.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: It appears that the Bain caption has the correct spelling: Bailly-Blanchard, which is also how it is spelled on the website Political Graveyard. The New York Times article noting his death in 1925 spells the name: Bai!ly-Blanchard in the headline.  One more source would confirm for the change to the caption.  Thanks so much.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Good enough for me.  Thanks Richard Arthur Norton, we'll correct the spelling of the name in the caption the next time we update the record.
